entry.title: Seven minutes in heaven
entry.summary:
Author: NightWrites_leaf

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 239,876Chapters: 35/?Kudos: 683

Summary: Dick Grayson thought it would be harmless, one chill night where the Young Justice crew and the Titans could actually relax together. No missions. No explosions. Just friends, laughter… and maybe a little too much alcohol. But when a round of Never Have I Ever spirals into Seven Minutes in Heaven, Dick and Wally find themselves a little too close in the dark — and suddenly, nothing feels simple anymore. Or;Wally and Dick’s developing relationship, full of tension, tenderness, and the two of them absolutely failing to keep their hands to themselves.

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 155,186Chapters: 30/?Kudos: 287

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.” After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can’t escape.

entry.title: I Know You’re Tired, Well I’m Tired Too
entry.summary:
Author: Kingiic

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,306Chapters: 7/30Kudos: 19

Summary: Light, all consuming and wet. The chords of blackness receded from the peripherals of his vision. Nothing remained of the evidence. The beast from seconds ago was nothing more than a literal stain on Gordon’s white button up. And Light; totally absolute in its buzzing heat. Gordon lifted his arm to shield his eyes from the beams. In an instant, the light dulled. Gordon took a moment to rub his eyes and readjust himself before looking at the six-foot bat signal pointing directly at him. Perched on the metal neck, standing just behind the dimmed light, stood the half-illuminated silhouette of the Batman. “We need to talk.” Began the familiar voice, low and stern. “Are you functional?”______________ Someone is making clones of this world’s most powerful individuals, Gotham is battling fascism and corruption in the midst of a mayoral race, and Batman must learn how to fight fire with fire, or else he'll have to make a few new friends.

entry.title: one look at you (and I can't disguise)
entry.summary:
Author: burningredbutitsgolden

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,677Chapters: 2/6Kudos: 21

Summary: As he entered his bedroom window and changed out of his primary-colored suit, Clark's thoughts wandered to what Batman's eyes looked like beneath those lenses. Were they warm and brown, softening the angular shape of his face? It seemed unlikely. He didn't think his eyes would be cold, necessarily, but maybe more of a striking color. Blue, like ice? Perhaps green, a rarer shade to fit his mystery? For all Clark knew, they could be something else entirely. OR: Superman and Batman are obsessed with each other. It manifests in extreme fixations on the other's eyes.

entry.title: And Now It Follows Me Everyday
entry.summary:
Author: theFamousLivingDead

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,955Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Gotham has a reputation that precedes itself, but these days even her city limits are overrun with chaos. The streets are littered with rumors about a new shape above the skyline. The docks have been taken over by gangs and civilians are forced to keep to a curfew for their own safety. Bruce Wayne is stumped when all his attempts to prevent crime from taking off in Gotham are thwarted by a lightningfast shadow. His worst nightmare comes true -- there is someone else out there, more powerful than he could ever train himself to be, and he's not on his side of history. In which Clark Kent went out to find more about himself and his origins, but the League of Assassins found him first.

entry.title: Take a chance on me
entry.summary:
Author: Panickymouse29

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 68,399Chapters: 41/?Kudos: 32

Summary: Aileen Allen was recruited into the Avatar Program at twenty-two after drawing RDA attention for her effectiveness in close-quarters security operations where escalation repeatedly failed. She wasn’t chosen for aggression, but for control—she ended threats quickly and quietly in environments where firearms were a liability. The RDA classified her as difficult: independent, resistant to rigid command, and openly critical of excessive force. Those traits would normally have ended her candidacy. Dr. Grace Augustine intervened, citing Aileen’s adaptability and restraint as exactly what the program lacked. On Pandora, Aileen immediately modified her uniform for mobility and heat, ignoring protocol in favour of survival. She demonstrated an unusual tendency to de-escalate Na’vi encounters rather than provoke them, earning Grace’s quiet approval—and RDA’s suspicion. By the time Jake Sully arrived, Aileen was already operating on the fringe of RDA control: respected by the scientists, tolerated by command, and trusted by Grace to act when others would make things worse.Pandora didn’t recruit Aileen Allen. Grace Augustine did.

entry.title: other world of Bats: the one that most confuse.
entry.summary:
Author: Noir_Nolan_NO1

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,406Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 291

Summary: Each chapter can be read as a one short, since I don't like to interrupt each events.When Clark Kent was preparing to enjoy a little break week from superhero, he didn’t prepare things quickly became a fight against the invaders outside the city, with other superheroes.Now he have new teammates, new friends. Right after just being call ‘lonely man’ by his two friends.And finally, he could have a more chance become friend with other fellas, learned more about the world around an—is that a huge bat ???I'm not good at writing introductions LOL.—————Alternative short:Bruce now knows how to do magic but still chose becomes a scary Batman so that people don't realize he is just have a normal human body.Kidna—Adopt some Batkids and become Gotham's favorite batfamily, when also separate from other heroes outside world.Eventually result of the Justice League and outside thinking they are just inhuman beings—and wild.The battling were evilly planning.the world was curious.And Gotham just stood by and watched this burn.People don't even realize how Superman changes when the bat often appears near him.
